member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE
member.summary: The DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE enumeration specifies that the information that is contained within the structure is either source or target mode.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE.DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE_SOURCE
member.summary: Indicates that the structure contains source mode information.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE.DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE_TARGET
member.summary: Indicates that the structure contains target mode information.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE.DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE_DESKTOP_IMAGE
member.summary: Indicates that the structure contains a valid structure. Supported starting in Windows 10.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE.DISPLAYCONFIG_MODE_INFO_TYPE_FORCE_UINT32
member.summary: Forces this enumeration to compile to 32 bits in size. Without this value, some compilers would allow this enumeration to compile to a size other than 32 bits. You should not use this value.
